data.text: @kivutaro Thanks for bringing this to our attention Jean-André! Please be assured that we have forwarded your feedback about our Vietnamese website to the appropriate team so they can look into this. Thanks - Lindsay
@throgmorton20 2/2 Please be assured that we're using your feedback to make some important changes. Thanks - Lee

@throgmorton20 1/2 Hi there, thanks for the tag. You definitely made a good point about providing  flights between Clark and Coolangatta but I hope you can appreciate that there are a number of factors to consider and generally, it's about customer's demand.

@fishylu_ Hi there, thanks for your tweet! You are allowed to bring one main bag and a small item onboard. The bag should fit the dimension of 56cm (height) x 36cm (width) x 23cm (depth). Please see this link for more information about the allowed cabin bags https://t.co/MGIt93EeYb. - Josh

@charlane0611 Hi Charlane, thank you for being a loyal Jetstar customer! At Jetstar, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully, your next flight with us will be a good one too! Happy Chinese New Year. :) - Josh

@alwaysberde Sure you can, Tintin! You'll just have to make sure that it's within the 100ml liquid limit when you're travelling internationally or when your domestic flight is departing from an international terminal. :) Hope this info helps! -Kelly

data.text: @RainRodriguez Hi Rain, I understand that you are concerned about the situation. Could you send us via DM your booking reference along with your full name so I can take a look at this for you? Thanks - Joie
@Wolfry Hi Wolfry, we'd like to check this for you. Kindly send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Yen
@akaOshinC Hi Joanna, the magazines are only available on-board but you can check this link for the online inflight magazine here: https://t.co/U4lHIZmxL7. Thanks - Maria
@akaOshinC Hi Joanna, it's good to know that you liked our inflight magazine onboard, however, you can only make use of it onboard. Thanks - Hazel
@Jillystweets01 Hi Jill, we'd like to look into this for you. Would you mind sending us a DM of your booking reference along with your full name? Thanks - Hazel
@JohnFethers Hi John, thanks for reaching. I recognise that 3K-513 is delayed and can advised that it has been departed at 21:21 pm. I'm sorry if there is update at the airport. Thanks - Jayme
@theaishahs Hey, we do our best to give passengers a great experience, so it's always nice to hear about the things we're getting right. See you again on-board soon! Cheers - Lee

@theaishahs Hi there, please know that the boarding gates is the airport's facility as such we have no control over this. We'll be happy to check on the status of your for you though, if you could send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. - Mariz

data.text: @canoodleson Hi Christina, I've managed to locate flight BL 350 from Ho Chi Minh City to Da Lat tomorrow and it's scheduled to depart at 5:10 PM. To see the status you may check here: https://t.co/r1egxfUQfm - Mariz

@bxyliss Hi Alex, that's definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself and we appreciate you bringing this up with us so we can use this for better service improvement. Thanks - Hazel

@purtyGF Hi Helga, I can totally appreciate that it's frustrating to arrive at your destination without your baggage. Would you mind sending us your booking reference and full name via DM so we could see how we could help? Thanks -Kelly

@jase_on_halcyon Hi there, we advise our customers not to post private information for their protection and as stated on our House Rules. You may want to send us a DM with your full name so we can see how we can assist you. Thanks - Hazel
@carashields3 2/2 and I'm sorry if this was not the case. But I'm glad that your baggage was already delivered to you. Again, my apologies for the inconvenience this has caused. Thanks - Hazel

@carashields3 1/2 Hi Cara, I recognise you're disappointed about the delay delivery of your baggage. Please be assured that we go to great lengths to take care of each piece of luggage and to return all your belongings immediately after you've arrived at your destination
@gypsypeepsy28 Hi there, I've responded to your DM with further details. Thanks - Lee
@Aliishaaa10 Hi Alisha, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Thanks - Jerry
@iMleesh 2/2 Safety is our utmost priority and you can be certain that our team is working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Hopefully, you’ll be on your way soon. – Josh

@iMleesh 1/2 Hi there, thanks for your tweet. At Jetstar, we do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. I understand that the pilot on your flight discovered an issue on the aircraft assigned to your flight.
@carashields3 Hi Cara, thanks for reaching out. I recognise that your baggage has been delayed. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name so we can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme

@2yno_ Hi there, please delete your tweet as we don't advise passengers providing their details on a public platform, you may wish to DM us your booking details so we can further assist with your concern. Thanks - Joie
@d_arbaroganista Thanks for tagging us. You can have your friend contact us directly so we can check this. Thanks - Jerry

@MarcoTalin Thanks for replying, Marco. The flight timetable for spring and summer (flights after 29 March 2020) has not been announced yet. I recommend that you keep an eye on our website for the availability of flights once the spring and summer time table is announced. - Josh
@MarcoTalin Hi Marco, we generally release fares around 8-10 months in advance, however this does vary between routes. I'd recommend checking our website from time to time for updates. Thanks - Maria

@asfoorrana Hi Rocky, I am unable to comment on other's passengers baggage as they might have purchased additional carry-on allowance however we do advise our passengers to meet both size and weight requirements of their baggage carry-on listed on their itinerary and on our website. - Joie

@asfoorrana Hi Rocky, we limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. If you have exceeded the allocated weight allowance, you will incur excess fees. You can check here: https://t.co/Gnpz06LBUv for more details. Thanks - Joie

urls.description: Everything you need to know about carry-on baggage allowances on Jetstar flights. Save on airport prices by booking in advance!

data.text: @allsm_scott Thanks for your tweet Scott. I understand that you were unhappy with your recent Jetstar experience in Singapore. Can you tell us more about what happened by sending us a DM also with your full name and booking reference and we'll see on how we can assist you. Thanks - Josh
@wonderkoks Hi there, we'd like to check this for you if you could send us a DM with your booking reference along with your full name so we can see how we can assist? Thanks - Hazel
@Pung89 Hi Adrian, we have flights departing in Manila today at NAIA airport. So we can check your flight status for you, please DM us your booking details. - Mariz

data.text: @chemitz Hi there, we'll be happy to assist you with correcting the passenger's name. Could you please send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Yen

@puyaw18 Hi there, we have a team monitoring the situation so if any flights will be affected due to the volcanic activity we'll send out SMS and emails. For updates though, you may monitor our Travel Alerts page here: https://t.co/OrYhKUczMl . - Mariz

urls.unwound_url: https://www.jetstar.com/ph/en/travel-alerts#FOR PASSENGERS TRAVELLING TO/FROM MANILA, CLARK ON 12,13 JANUARY

data.text: @Ugay_Cruz That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, Arlene. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Jerry
@ichal_busyro85 Hi Faisal, I have now responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee

@bane_mango Hi Bane, we aim to keep you updated about what is happening with your flight but sometimes the situation could be unexpected & the information might not be at hand straight away. If you could DM us your booking reference & full name, we'll be glad to look into this. - Lee
@kellycramps Hi Kelly, I've responded to your DM with further details. Thanks - Lee
@paolo2hot4u Hi there, thanks for your tweet. Could you DM us the booking reference or flight number for the flight from Manila to Nagoya so we can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@jz_x_ Hi there, I've responded to your DM. Thanks - Lee
@yaahabibty Hi Sash, I understand how upsetting it is when you missed your flight. We'd like to look into this, could you provide us your booking reference via DM? Thanks - Yen

@Tombull10 Hi Thomas, I'm sorry to hear about you recent experience on your flight with us from Da Nang to Phu Quoc. Please provide more details about this via DM, to see how we're able to assist. - Mariz
@richardjang Hi Richard, yes you can add checked baggage using third party ticket sellers. Alternatively, you can also add checked baggage here on our end. Thanks - Hazel
@channasilva2000 Hey Channa, hope you'll enjoy your flight! :) Cheers - Lee
@sthayes74 Hi Scott, I understand that you disappointed with your seats with us. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Joie
@matt_the_irish Thanks for tagging us. We’d like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and name and one of our Social Media team will be with you shortly. Thanks – Jerry
@shafira_aidid Hi there, thanks for reaching out. You send us a DM with your booking reference and full name and we can assist you about your upcoming flight. Thanks - Jayme

@drophies Hi Dara, we advise our customers not to post private information such as your booking reference for your protection and as stated on our House Rules. Could you send us a DM with your booking reference and your full name please? Thanks - Hazel
@themadray Thanks for getting back to us, Damian. We've replied to your DM. -Kelly

@themadray Hi Damian, that doesn't seem like the sort of experience we'd like you to have! Would you mind sending us your booking reference and full name via DM so we could look into this? Thanks -Kelly
@bubunkTedy Hi there, you can contact us on +62 803 852 9779 and/or 001 803 852 9779 for further assistance. You can check our website here: https://t.co/m0sBKIYGHk for more details. Thanks - Joie

urls.title: Contact numbers | Jetstar
urls.description: Hello! The quickest and easiest way to make changes to your booking is at Manage booking. If you can’ t find what you’ re looking for, please give us a call on one of the numbers listed below. 131 538 charges apply, Monday to Sunday 4001 201 260 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +613 9645 5999 charges apply, Monday to Sunday in English, Monday to Friday, 9.00am to 6.00pm (local time) in Mandarin and Cantonese +852 3192

data.text: @Shelfside166 Hi there, I'm glad to hear that Paul has been able to sort this out for you. Would you mind sending us your booking reference and full name via DM so we could pass on your kind words accordingly? Thanks! -Kelly :)
The Business Times in Singapore report how Jetstar outranks SIA for on-time performance..https://t.co/ll3T8dYwMm
@marcel_ignatius Hi Marcel, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Thanks - Yen

@247ankit Hi Ankit. For your security, kindly delete your tweet as we don't recommend posting your booking reference on a public platform. Please send us a DM so we could discuss this further. Thanks - Yen
@247ankit This should be fine, Ankit. Just be sure the combined weight of the four luggage is within your total allowable checked baggage allowance. - Mariz

@247ankit Hi Ankit, it may help to know that the maximum checked baggage allowance per passenger is 40 kg. However, if you have travel companions on the booking, you can bring as many as you want as long as the combined weight will not exceed the total allowance. Thanks - Yen
@adrianpenguin1 Hi Adrian, if you could provide more details about your concern via DM so we can see how we’re able to assist. - Mariz
@a_bert23 Hi Bert, thanks for your tweet. Yes, your safety razor and shaving cream can be taken on board in your carry-on baggage. Hope this helps. Cheers - Lee

data.text: @kellycramps Hi Kelly, we'd like to check this for you. Please DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Joie
@wilde_ness Thanks for responding Nixxie, our system is currently not ready yet. I appreciate your understanding on this matter. Thanks - Hazel

@Smashwa Hi James, thanks for waiting. I understand that you are unhappy with the long wait at our baggage drop counter and I apologise about this. Since you are the airport, I suggest that you approach one of our staff so they can assist you. - Josh
@wilde_ness 2/2 Our technical team are working hard to fix the issue. You may wish to contact us again in a few hours. - Josh

@wilde_ness 1/2 Thanks for replying Nixxie. I recognise that you were not provided with meal vouchers despite the delay on your flight. I'd like to assist you on this however we are currently having a system upgrade.

data.text: @pagodaavenue Hi there, we do our best to avoid delays as we know how inconvenient delayed flights can be. Please be assured that your feedback is important to us so we can use this for better service improvement. Thanks - H
@LukKozlowski Thanks for your tweet, Luk. Please note that we can only respond on tweets in English Language. Are you able to respost this in English? Thanks - Josh
@izzy004 Hi Ismawan, we know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. I hope your recovery flight would be a much smoother journey. Thanks -Kelly
@vish1139 Hi Vishwaroop, could you please DM us your booking reference and full name? We'd like to see how we can help. Thanks - Kelly
@saintinc Hi Joshua, we’d like to check this further for you. Kindly send us a DM along with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Yen
@hashtagtravel4 I see, thanks for the info. Could you please DM us your route, flight numbers and possible travel dates so we could check? Thanks -Kelly
@hashtagtravel4 Hi there, please DM us your booking reference and full name so we can better look into this. Hope to hear from you soon. Thanks - Lee

@scitty1 Thanks for your tweet Scott. I understand that your booked exit rows seats were removed from your booking. Please send us a DM with your full name and booking reference and we'll see on how we can assist you. Thanks - Josh
@MeineLiebeDoner Hi Jasmine, would you mind sending us your booking reference and full name via DM? We'd like to look into this. Thanks -Kelly
@perthbeach Thanks for tagging us. You can check which terminal we operate on our website here https://t.co/Tpr6IAp6ui. Thanks - Jerry

urls.title: Which airport and terminal should I go to for my flight? | Jetstar
urls.description: Don't get stuck at the wrong airport or terminal. Find all the details on how to locate the correct airport and departure or arrival terminal here.

data.text: @BlueOceanzTV Thanks for tagging us. We’d like to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking reference and name and one of our Social Media team will be with you shortly. Thanks – Jerry
@sweetweet213 Hi Vishnu, please send your booking reference and full name via DM so we can check the status of your booking. Thanks - Lee

@SoonTheamKhoo Hi there, we have no issue reported on troubles doing online check-in. I would suggest clearing your browser's cookies and cache or going incognito/private mode. I hope this helps! Thanks - Mariz
@tokyogirlred07 Hi there, we'd like to check this for you. Are you to DM us your booking reference along with your full name so we can check this for you. Thanks - Joie
@tokyogirlred07 Hi there, if you're departing from NAIA you'll need to pay the Philippine travel tax before heading to your check-in counter. I hope this information helps. - Mariz
@sugasinterloud Hi there, we'd be happy to look into this for you. Please DM us your booking details along with your full name so we can assist. Thanks - Joie
@sugasinterloud Hi there, we can help change the name on your ticket. Could you please send us a DM of your booking reference and full name along with further details so we can assist? Thanks - Cy

@vintagemarilyn Hi there, thanks for getting in touch. I recognise that your wife accidentally booked incorrect flight time and I'm sorry she was not provided a refund. Jetstar fares do come with certain rules and restrictions and we outlined this on the booking process. Thanks - Jayme
@d_arbaroganista Thanks for replying FK, yes the excess fee charges once you're over 40kg. Thanks - Jayme

@d_arbaroganista Hi there, thanks fr your tweet. Our excess baggage rate for Singapore - Manila/Clark flights is SGD20 per kilo. Please see this link for more information https://t.co/XRzXIPXl0X. - Josh

urls.title: Excess baggage charges at the airport | Jetstar
urls.description: Your guide to Jetstar's policy regarding excess baggage checked in at the airport for domestic and international flights, including fees.

data.text: @happybdayjaz22 Hi there, you can bring your Harry Potter wand on board as long as it will not exceed the size requirement of our carry on (56cm (H) x 36cm (W) x 23cm (D)) and this will still be subject for approval.  Thanks - H

data.text: @VishalS17442593 Hi Vishal, thanks for your tweet. I understand that you'd like to be check through for your flight. Could you DM us your booking reference along with your full name so I can check this for you? Thanks - Jayme
@watyousee Hi there, I've responded to your DM. - Mariz
@TriumphGrace @huuhaa_ (2/2) So thanks for the heads up, we value your feedback on this as this will help us improve our service in the future. - Mariz

@TriumphGrace @huuhaa_ (1/2) Hi there, I'm sorry to hear you weren't comfortable on your flight with us. It may help to know that before we fly, our cabin crew do a spot clean and I'm sorry that this was not the case for you.

@megng15 Thanks for your reply. Please know that price may vary depending on the date but I can confirm that it is considerably cheaper when you add this during the booking process. I hope this help. Thanks - Jerry
@megng15 Hi Meg, so we can check the current costs of adding 20 kg checked baggage on your flight, could you please send a DM of your booking reference and full name please? Thanks - Cy

@Cufflar Hi James! I understand that you're having difficulties checking in online for your flight tomorrow. Could you DM us your booking reference and full name so we could check this further? Thanks - Yen

@YYlouisa Hi Louisa, I'm sorry you're having trouble connecting with our customer service team. If you could send us a DM of your booking reference and full name along with details of your concern, we may be able to see how we can assist. Thanks - Cy

@NeverShoutNico Thanks for replying Nick. One-Time Password for your online transactions using your credit card is being handled by your credit card provider (BDO) and is beyond Jetstar's control. I recommend that you contact your credit card provider directly about this. - Josh

data.text: @vikkiabrahart Hi vikki, we can definitely look into this. Please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Lee

@vikkiabrahart 2/2 You can also try to access our website using the incognito mode of your browser. Thanks - Maria
